Title: C# Checkbox Menu
Description: A simple user control written in c# to display a context menu
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple user control written in c# to display a context menu

User Control to put a collection of check boxes and text boxes on a context menu that drops down when a checkbox is engaged (checked) and disappears when checkbox is unchecked.

Menu stays visible while checkbox is checked allowing changes to multiple menu items.
This is an easy way to hide items that are not commonly used.
